They are so brave! My God! The fire that blows from their dilated nostrils and the spite that sputters from mouths---but---go to Atlanta? No *sir*! Not *me*! I'm busy. I'm just about the busiest person you ever saw.

O, they were radical! They were Red and red-hot. They had fought for their country. They belonged to the American Legion and they sat 500 strong, clamorous with applause.

But when we asked for volunteers to protest a libellous film play, five promised and two came!
